message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay no more than $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I'm confident this product offers you significant value beyond $12,000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $12,500.
